channel.title: Rune mtp NPC creating problem. NEED YOUR HELP :c
channel.description:
Hellow guys i just got one tiny problem but i don't know how to solve it.. If u maybe now how i can fix this? (or u got marcbob messengers ask him to watch this topic: he's the creater of the source)
The npc's is probably nulled how can i fix that? i got all the anim id's.. for this npc..
Watch in the chat box. [size=10pt]"This npc is not attackable, pleas post it in bug reports. F you have the animations for attacking, blocking, and dying, t'd also be a plus. Thank's :-)"[/size] So probably he coded it that this would happen.. How can i get this away? [IMG]http://i1095.photobucket.com/albums/i463/ebert4/Naamloos-1.jpg[/img]

item.title: Rune mtp NPC creating problem. NEED YOUR HELP :c
item.dc:creator: @ebert ebert
item.description:
@ebert wrote:

kingcobra805:

just search for where he put this text and delete whats keeping you from attacking it?

Ej lol why didn’t think about that… XD i’l try if it fails i’l edit this…

i Deleted the sentence and above but it stay’s the same. EVEN WHEN I DELETED IT! if i change something in the sentence it wont change ingame… so lol i think this is dam weard…

Read full topic
